name: Digital Camouflage
content: This specialized digital outerwear is used by elite black ops specialists on ultra-secret espionage missions. 360 degrees of camera coverage feeds dynamic digital concealment which is projected on the suit's exterior.
content-md: This specialized digital outerwear is used by elite black ops specialists on ultra-secret espionage missions. 360 degrees of camera coverage feeds dynamic digital concealment which is projected on the suit's exterior.
